title: An aqueous vanadium complex for the superior electrolyte of a thermo-electrochemical cell
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,684-688
DOI: 10.1039/D3SE00774J, Communication
Teppei Yamada, Takashi Kobayashi, Yusuke Wakayama, Fumitoshi Matoba, Koichi Yatsuzuka, Nobuo Kimizuka, Hongyao Zhou
The Seebeck coefficient of a thermo-electrochemical cell consisting of vanadium complexes reaches −3.2 mV K−1 in water and −3.8 mV K−1 in a mixed solvent.
